Mod.name: Extol's EDrug
Mod.description:
Constant Tripping Effect, and comes with mod settings for control of the effect. 
Mod Setting can even be adjusted Mid-run, and the effect will vanish when mod is disabled. 
Shoutout to Evaisa for being the most helpful person in the world!!!!!!! 
 
SEIZURE WARNING!!! Use Responsibly. 
 
https://github.com/ExtolsSuperSauce/Extols_EDrug
